scripts.prepare: rm -rf lib/ && set-defaults .vscode && forge install --no-git forge-std-v1.9.1=foundry-rs/forge-std@v1.9.1 solady-v0.0.292=Vectorized/solady@v0.0.292 openzeppelin-v0.4.7.3=openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts@v4.7.3 openzeppelin-v0.5.0.2=openzeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts@v5.0.2 || echo ''
scripts.deploy:dev: env-cmd -f .env cross-env-shell 'wait-port http://:8420/ready && forge script script/Counter.s.sol --broadcast --private-key $DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY'
